home.paragraphOne: Tom is passionate about designing and building creative solutions to complex problems.
home.paragraphTwo: He is a technical lead at Good Energy, doing his part to tackle climate change, something he has always been passionate about.
home.paragraphThree: Tom believes in supporting the development community by actively mentoring other developers and demonstrates different technologies and techniques.
home.paragraphFour: Whilst out of the workplace, Tom can often be found walking his dog Maggie with his partner Eloise, trying out new recipies or playing pool in the Bristol Pool League.
